sentences.en: And transmitting channel respect, instant communication tool, email is the most frequent filch way.
sentences.cn: 而在传播渠道方面, 即时通信工具 、 电子邮件是最频繁的窃取途径.

sentences.en: Argus Filch : Anyone here, my sweet? Come on.
sentences.cn: 阿格斯·费尔奇: 这儿有人吗, 小甜心? 走吧.

sentences.en: He filched a bottle of wine from the cellar.
sentences.cn: 他从地窖里偷了一瓶酒。
赫敏·格兰杰: 费尔奇走了.

sentences.en: No, Mr. Filch! you don't understand.
sentences.cn: 不, 费尔奇先生, 你并不了解!

sentences.en: O 176 : As they stepped into the corridor, Filch's face loomed suddenly out of the darkness.
sentences.cn: 他们一跨进走廊, 费尔奇的脸就突然从黑暗里显现出来.

trans.tran_cn: 偷窃(不贵重的东西), 窃取
trans.tran_en: to steal something small or not very valuable

trans.tran_cn: <非正>偷（尤指小的或不贵重的物品）
